Effect: Bottled Lightning.name: Effect: Bottled Lightning
Effect: Bottled Lightning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.AFR01HVd7DcZvkpP]{Bottled Lightning (Lesser)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.97QyNEOAyYLdGaYc]{Bottled Lightning (Moderate)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.r2iTRbt1zpkAqHj2]{Bottled Lightning (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.rpbbfkexLhtadBDV]{Bottled Lightning (Major)}

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of your foe's next turn.

Effect: Critical Specialization (Bow).name: Effect: Critical Specialization (Bow)
Effect: Critical Specialization (Bow).description: You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and must spend an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action to attempt a @Check[athletics|dc:10|name:Pull the Missile Free|showDC:all] to pull the missle free; you are unable to move from your space until you succeed.

Effect: Critical Specialization (Brawlin.name: Effect: Critical Specialization (Brawling)
Effect: Critical Specialization (Brawlin.description: You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of your foe's next turn.

Effect: Critical Specialization (Spear).name: Effect: Critical Specialization (Spear)
Effect: Critical Specialization (Spear).description: Your attacked have been weakened, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the start of your foe's next turn.

Effect: Critical Specialization (Sword).name: Effect: Critical Specialization (Sword)
Effect: Critical Specialization (Sword).description: You are off-balance from your foe's attack, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of their next turn.

Effect: Demoralize Immunity.name: Effect: Demoralize Immunity
Effect: Demoralize Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to further attempts to Demoralize from them for the duration.

Effect: Disarm (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Disarm (Critical Failure)
Effect: Disarm (Critical Failure).description: You lose your balance and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Feint (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Feint (Critical Failure)
Effect: Feint (Critical Failure).description: Your foe's feint backfired, They are now @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against your melee attacks until the end of their next turn.

Effect: Feint (Critical Success).name: Effect: Feint (Critical Success)
Effect: Feint (Critical Success).description: You throw your enemy's defenses against you entirely off. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against melee attacks that you attempt against it until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Feint (Success).name: Effect: Feint (Success)
Effect: Feint (Success).description: Your foe is fooled, but only momentarily. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the next melee attack that you attempt against it before the end of your current turn.

Effect: Grapple (Critical Success).name: Effect: Grapple (Critical Success)
Effect: Grapple (Critical Success).description: You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} until the end of your foe's next turn unless they move or you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}.

Effect: Grapple (Success).name: Effect: Grapple (Success)
Effect: Grapple (Success).description: You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} until the end of your foe's next turn unless they move or you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}.

Effect: Mistform Elixir (Greater).name: Effect: Mistform Elixir (Greater)
Effect: Mistform Elixir (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.04giYigfDL5geu5f]{Mistform Elixir (Greater)}

A faint mist emanates from your skin, making you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} for 5 minutes.

Effect: Mistform Elixir (Lesser).name: Effect: Mistform Elixir (Lesser)
Effect: Mistform Elixir (Lesser).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.GyO89RBVjAKFxsFm]{Mistform Elixir (Lesser)}

A faint mist emanates from your skin, making you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} for 3 rounds.

Effect: Mistform Elixir (Moderate).name: Effect: Mistform Elixir (Moderate)
Effect: Mistform Elixir (Moderate).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Ax8XcBd0rRd1Z7hN]{Mistform Elixir (Moderate)}

A faint mist emanates from your skin, making you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} for 1 minute.

Effect: Scoundrel Feint (Critical Succes.name: Effect: Scoundrel Feint (Critical Success)
Effect: Scoundrel Feint (Critical Succes.description: You are off-guard against all melee attacks until the end of your foe's next turn.

Effect: Scoundrel Feint (Success).name: Effect: Scoundrel Feint (Success)
Effect: Scoundrel Feint (Success).description: Your target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against your melee attacks until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Scoundrel Off-Guard.name: Effect: Scoundrel Off-Guard
Effect: Scoundrel Off-Guard.description: Your target is off-guard from all melee attacks.

Effect: Tumble Behind.name: Effect: Tumble Behind
Effect: Tumble Behind.description: Your foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the next attack you make before the end of your turn.
